column3: [' (StepDescription: Fill-Fill a microwave-safe mug with skimmed milk)']

column4: ErrorDescription:Add-Add 1/5 teaspoon cinnamon to the mug. Spilling happened while adding. Also first put 1/2 tsp first and then to make 1/5 remove the added cinnamon from top of milk. Incorrect way to add 1/5 tsp cinnamon.)

column4: ErrorDescription:Mix-Mix the contents of the mug. Not doing circular and slowly mixing the contents of mug. Instead did hastily and spilling the milk. Also motion was up-down and sideways instead of cicular.)

column4: ErrorDescription:Heat-Heat the contents of the mug for 40 seconds and serve it on glass plate cover. Also timing started from 10:30 and stopped at 9:50.)
